events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund as it doesn't fit well and I am disappointed with the quality.
System has identified the issue as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with the product fit and quality.
Your request is now assigned to a customer service representative who will assist with the refund process shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you wish to request a refund for your recent purchase. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for your refund request so I can assist you further?
My order number is 123456. The jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size, and the material feels cheap compared to the description.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate your refund and provide you with a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket at no extra cost.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label will make the return easier.
The refund process has been started. Please send back the jacket using the prepaid label, and your money will be returned once we receive the product.
Just checking in to confirm that you have sent the return package and to see if you need any more assistance with your refund.
Yes, the package was dropped off yesterday at the post office. Thank you for following up!
We have received your returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
